mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE (sender_id, receiver_id, content) VALUES (#{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT id, sender_id as senderId, receiver_id as receiverId, content, created_at as createdAt, read_yn as readYn FROM MESSAGE WHERE receiver_id = #{receiverId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, sender_id as senderId, receiver_id as receiverId, content, created_at as createdAt, read_yn as readYn FROM MESSAGE WHERE (sender_id = #{senderId} AND receiver_id = #{receiverId}) OR (sender_id = #{receiverId} AND receiver_id = #{senderId}) ORDER BY created_at ASC
